name.data: Seven Seas Pregnancy 21 Vitamins & Minerals 28 Tablets

description.data: Seven Seas Pregnancy vitamins and minerals are a comprehensive mix that works to ensure that you and your baby get everything you need for healthy growth during the pregnancy.

usage_indicaion.data: It is recommended that you only take one tablet a day. If you miss a day, then do not take two the next day.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Taking these tablets at any stage of pregnancy will help promote healthy growth and development. They will also help you to get the vitamins and minerals needed.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: These vitamins and minerals are suitable for any pregnant woman who is looking to ensure that their baby is as healthy as can be during pregnancy. You should not take these tablets if you are allergic to any of the ingredients in them.

description.data: Pregnacare Plus is a dual pack of supplements which contain vitamins, minerals, and nutrients which are ideal for pregnant women. They help to provide you and your baby with the essential nutrients you both need to be at your best during this life changing time.

usage_indicaion.data: Take one Pregnacare Plus tablet from the green blister pack and one Omega-3 capsule from the pink blister pack every day. Take with your main meal and swallow wish a sip of water or another cold drink. You should only take this product on a full stomach. Do not take more than the recommended daily dose.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Pregnacare Plus tablets contain the 400µg of folic acid that the NHS recommends that you take during the first 12 weeks of pregnancy. Folic acid helps to reduce the risk of the development of neural tube defects, such as spina bifida, in a developing foetus, encouraging healthy spinal growth. They also contain vitamin D, which helps to control the amount of calcium in your body, encouraging healthy bone development, plus a whole host of other essential vitamins and minerals. At the same time, the Omega-3 capsules provide 300mg of the fatty acid DHA, which helps to contribute to normal brain and eye development in your foetus.

cosmetics_text_formula.data:
This Pregnacare Plus dual pack contains a daily vitamin and mineral tablet and Omega-3 capsules, which are formulated to work together to support both you and your baby throughout pregnancy. The vitamin and mineral tablets contain:

Vitamin D – 10µg
Vitamin E – 4mg α-TE
Vitamin K – 70µg
Vitamin C – 70mg
Vitamin B1 (Thiamin) – 3mg
Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin) – 2mg
Vitamin B3 (Niacin) – 20mg NE
Vitamin B6 – 10mg
Folic Acid – 400µg
Vitamin B12 – 6µg
Biotin – 150µg
Pantothenic acid – 6mg
Magnesium – 150mg
Iron – 17mg
Zinc – 15mg
Copper – 1000µg
Selenium – 30µg
Iodine – 150µg
Betacarotene (natural source) – 2mg

name.data: Sambucol Kids Liquid Black Elderberry & Vit C - 120ml

description.data: Sambucol Kids Liquid is a food supplement designed to make sure your child is getting all the Vitamin C they need. Perfect for children aged 1 - 12, this supplement contains black elderberry for a delicious natural flavour that kids will love. This product is vegan friendly, gluten-free, and contains no yeast, milk, or artificial colours or sweeteners.

usage_indicaion.data:
Give Sambucol Kids Liquid to your child after a meal, this product should not be taken on an empty stomach. If you want to, you can give the daily dose to your child throughout the day, rather than all at once. The recommended daily dose of this product will be different depending on your child’s age and the time of year:

Children aged 1 - 6: One 5ml teaspoon a day

Children aged 7 - 12: Two 5ml teaspoons (10ml) a day

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Sambucol Kids Liquid contains vitamin C, which is an essential vitamin that helps to protect your cells and support wound healing and the immune system. It also helps your body to maintain healthy skin, blood vessels, bones, and cartilage. You can find Vitamin C in a wide range of fruits and vegetables, but some parents choose to give their child Vitamin C supplements to make sure they’re getting all of this important nutrient they need.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Sambucol Kids Liquid contains 32.5mg vitamin C (41%) and  Black Elderberry 0.95g.

description.data: Shoot with either hand and share easily - Shoot using right or left hand with Switch Grip II; - Share and save photos wirelessly with built-in Wi-Fi; - Record in stunning 1920 x 1080 60i Full HD clarity; - Get closer to the action with 20x optical zoom. 0º, 90º, 180º - Enjoy a greater degree of flexibility with Switch Grip II One thing lefties and righties can agree on is that the streamlined and compact QF20 / Q20 with Switch Grip II was made for both. Because no matter in which hand it’s held, the camcorder’s LCD screen will adjust to ensure that the picture is shown right-side up. More comfortable shooting while holding the camcorder vertically? Good news: you can rotate the screen 90º, and the image will remain right-side up. Shooting video from difficult positions has never been easier. Instant Sharing & Saving, simply Wi-Fi Connectivity With built-in Wi-Fi capability, you can share any special and exciting videos on the move. Send videos by uploading to Facebook™, Picasa™, Photobucket™ or email directly from the camcorder. You can also upload them to YouTube™ then sit back and wait for the rave reviews. The QF20 also lets you upload to online cloud services so never worried about losing your videos while on the go or running out of memory. The TV Link feature allows you to wirelessly display videos on a Wi-Fi TV screen. You can also save them to your PC with just one click using the Auto Backup feature. No more searching for the cable – it’s that easy. Relive your adventures with Full HD Recording 1920 x 1080 / 60p Why shoot just video when you can shoot Full HD movies? With 1920x1080 60i resolution, you capture richly detailed images with vivid colour and intense clarity. This helps ensure picture perfection on your HDTV or Wi-Fi HD monitor, and a superb viewing experience for you. Presenting a new take on Full HD recording. The QF20 / Q20’s Switch Grip II function not only lets you hold the camcorder in either hand, it also allows for vertical recording so you’re always in perfect position to capture heartwarming moments and hilarious slipups in amazing HD. The QF20 also allows you to share your memories straight away, through its Wi-Fi capabilities, to your favourite online social networks and cloud services, from any Wi-Fi hotspot. It’s never been this easy to shoot and share Full HD 1080p video. My Clip Play back your favourite moments of a night out with friends or a hike through the woods without having to waste time fast-forwarding or rewinding. The My Clip feature allows you to tag any scene in your video, so you can instantly relive the most hilarious bits or amazing sights over and over again with no additional editing. 20x Optical zoom, 40x Digital-zoom Lightweight and compact, the QF20/Q20 goes wherever you go. It also features a Schneider-Kreuznach lens with 20x Optical Zoom (40x Digital Zoom) that puts you in the middle of the action, even when you’re far away. Capture a game-winning goal from the far end of the soccer field, or a band rocking out even from the back row. Details are as crisp and clear as if you were shooting from up close. OIS Duo Plus With OIS (Optical Image Stabiliser) Duo Plus, you can capture clear and steady video, even if you have a case of shaky hands. The QF20 / Q20 combines a built-in OIS with digital image stabilisation technology to prevent bumps, jolts, and shivers from blurring image quality. OIS Duo Plus also compensates for body movement that can occur while you’re moving around, or for the movement of the digital zoom. Smart BGM II (with My Music) Add a professional touch to your movies with Smart BGM II (with My Music).Select one of four preloaded classical pieces to add to your videos, or import your favourite songs from your PC’s music library by using Samsung’s Intelli-Studio. And if there’s talking in the scene, it won’t get drowned out - Smart BGM II automatically lowers the music, so you always hear whoever is speaking. Smart Auto No matter what time of day it is, no matter where you are, with Smart Auto you’re ready for nearly any shooting scenario. Automatically select from one of 11 preset modes - such as Night, Natural Green, Macro and Portrait - to instantly compensate for a variety of varying light conditions or image details. Never again miss shooting a spontaneous scene due to time-consuming setting adjustments. Art Time-lapse Recording Capture an event that takes place over the course of hours such the sun rising and setting and present it in a fraction of the time. Art Time-Lapse Recording captures still frames at preset intervals, then creates an HD file with the stills placed in sequential order. A variety of modes, including Night Time, Zooming, Panning and Reverse Playback, give you more creative options. Record Pause While shooting a video in Record Pause mode, it allows you to briefly pause the recording and then pick up right where you left off without creating a new file. This way you only have one file to work with and don’t have to merge files for editing, sharing or transferring. Shake It Next time you record a get-together, add some fun with Shake It. Just a couple of jostles of the camcorder can randomly add one of several different fun and artistic digital effects to a scene. Shake It even works in Playback Mode, when it will embed preloaded music into your clip. 2.7” Smart Touch LCD Change the way you look at things with the 2.7" QVGA Touch LCD (230k resolution). The large screen delivers clean, crisp images that are saturated with natural colour and deep, dynamic detail. And the size also makes the touchscreen easier to use to find the feature or content you’re looking for. 4.9M Still Photo While recording video and without interruption, you are able to capture still images (5.5 Megapixel) that are as vivid and vibrant as life itself.

Samsung HMX-W300BP. Sensor type: CMOS, Optical sensor size: 1/3.3, Effective megapixels (image): 5.5. Camcorder media type: Memory card, Compatible memory cards: SD, SDHC. Focus adjustment: Auto, Normal focusing range: 0.04. ISO sensitivity: Auto. White balance: Auto

Defined High Def Not all high definition is created equal. Get it in decidedly gorgeous, truly Full 1920x1080/60i HD for exceptional high definition quality. Better Shots in Low Light Experience stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain with a back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor. Engineered specifically for compact cameras and camcorders, the Exmor R CMOS sensor is designed to let you shoot video in lower lighting conditions with better results. Bye Bye Blur SteadyShot image stabilization with Active Mode compensates for greater degrees of camera shake to deliver stunningly smooth video from wide angle to full telephoto shooting. Innovative 3-way shake-canceling adds electronic roll stability for even smoother video capture. 30x Extended Zoom Extended digital zoom works in conjunction with 25x optical zoom to get you 30x closer to the action, maintaining HD image quality as you pan in for an extreme close-up. Legendary Lens Step it up with a professional-quality Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens designed specifically for compact camcorders. Precision ground optics help maintain the sharpness and contrast of larger lenses, while SteadyShot image stabilization helps reduce annoying blur caused by camera shake. A Brilliant Touch Vibrant 2.7" Clear Photo LCD touch screen makes framing up and reviewing footage a breeze. Sharp, vivid images make subjects pop off the screen – even outdoors – while enabling you to switch up menu settings on the fly ensuring the best shoot possible.

- Full HD camcorder with very high image quality and versatile functions
- Full HD 1920x1080 50p recording - Full HD recording at very high bit rate with 50p progressive shooting mode for highest image quality and smoothness
- 25p progressive recording mode - Shoots Full HD images at 25 frames per second to achieve cinematic feel with your video footage
- Recording on optional memory card - Records on choice of removable Memory Stick' or SD cards (Memory Stick Pro Duo' or SD/SDHC)
- G Lens with 12x optical zoom/20x extended zoom - Excellent optical performance: 26.8mm (video and photo) wide angle ideal for group shots, landscapes and more
- Optical SteadyShot with enhanced Active Mode - With 3-Way Shake-Cancelling for stable images, even while walking. Now offers enhanced stabilisation at all zoom settings
- Super sensitive 1/3.91 type Exmor R' CMOS Sensor - Highly efficient, large sensor captures detail-packed video and still images with reduced image noise, especially in low light
- BIONZ processor - High-speed image processor for enhanced image quality and responsive performance
- Up to 20.4 Megapixel still photo - By Pixel Super Resolution Technology ensures extremely detailed, high quality still images
- 7.5cm/3" Xtra Fine LCD - 921k dot wide touchscreen with TruBlack technology for high-contrast images
- Connect and quick charge with built-in USB cable - USB cable stows neatly in camcorder's hand strap. Connect Handycam® to your computer and transfer videos or recharge battery
- Easy interface with Event Browse - Intuitive playback solution groups your camcorder footage and still photos by events: allows easy searching to favourites
- Highlight Playback - Automatically edits together movie highlights and still photos with music and transitions: burn the results to DVD or share online
- Intelligent AUTO (iAUTO) mode - Recognizes up to 180 combinations of Face Detection, scene settings and handheld/tripod shooting: adjusts for best results
- Tracking focus - Select an object on the touchscreen and keep autofocus locked on moving subjects, even if they're not people: ideal for pets
- Quick AF - Autofocus locks onto subject at high speed for clear, sharply-focused images, even in low-light conditions
- High Quality 5.1ch surround sound - Sensitive new microphone design captures dialogue and surround sound with superb clarity
- Auto Wind Noise Reduction - Advanced processing reduces wind noise for clearer outdoor sountracks; automatically adjusts processing to match wind strength
- Closer Voice for clearer dialogue and speech - Boosts microphone directionality and optimises processing to reduce noise and background sounds when faces are detected
- Stereo speaker with S-Master amplifer technology - High quality linear phase speaker system delivers clear, natural stereo sound when playing back your clips
- Face Detection and Smile Shutter - Capture clear, natural portraits: automatically shoot still photos of smiling faces during video recording
- Direct Copy - Transfer video footage direct to an external hard disk drive without PC: playback with fun camcorder features
- DVDirect Express compatibility - PC-free burning to AVCHD or Standard Definition DVD discs with compatible Sony DVDirect Express writer
- HDMI® output - Connect camcorder for viewing any HD Ready TV
- BRAVIA Sync - Directly control camcorder playback functions via remote of connected BRAVIA® television
- Golf Shot - Automatically captures a high-speed burst of images to freeze fast-moving action at exactly the right moment
- PlayMemories Home - Built-in software allows easy transfers to PC for editing, printing, disc burning, emailing and web uploads

Full HD camcorder resistant to water, dust and shocks Record Full HD on micro memory card, 10x optical zoom/29.8mm wide angle, 7.5cm/3" LCD touchpanel, GPS - Resists water, dust and shocks - Steady video footage, even when zooming - Very high quality Full HD images in low light

description.data: Care+ Magnesium Sulphate Paste is a topical treatment for skin infections such as boils and carbuncles. Boils and carbuncles can be unsightly and cause discomfort, especially when touched or when exposed to friction caused by clothing. Care+ Magnesium offers a quick and easy solution to treat troublesome skin complaints and ease discomfort caused by boils and carbuncles.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Magnesium Sulpate paste helps to treat boils and carbuncles by drawing moisture from the affected area. This dries up the boil which helps to alleviate the pain and discomfort, as well as helping to support the healing process.

cosmetic_authorized_claim.data: This product is a medicine; make sure to speak to your doctor  before taking this product if you have an underlying medical problem or are taking any other medicine or complementary therapy. If your symptoms get worse or continue after taking this product, contact us or your doctor.

name.data: Vitabiotics WellKid Peppa Pig Multi-Vitamin - 30 Vegan Soft Jellies

description.data: Vitabiotics Wellkid Peppa Pig Multivitamin Vegan Soft Jellies are a supplement that can help to support your little one’s nutrition, so they’re ready for their next adventure! The delicious jellies have a natural strawberry flavour and contain 8 B-complex vitamins, as well as vitamin A, C, D and E. They are suitable for both vegetarians and vegans and can help to supplement your child’s diet to ensure they are receiving all the nutrients they need to support their growth, health and development. They have been specially developed with children’s needs in mind to help safeguard your child’s nutritional intake and are easy to administer. If you’re looking for a multi-vitamin supplement for your child, trust the UK’s No.1 vitamin company and try Vitabiotics Wellkid Peppa Pig Multi-Vitamin Vegan Soft Jellies.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: We tend to receive all the vitamins and minerals our body needs from our food through consuming a healthy, balanced diet. However, some young children may be missing out on these essential nutrients through having a small appetite or being picky eaters. The Department of Health recommends that all children up to the age of 5 should be given a supplement that contains A, C and D to help replace the vitamins that may not be consumed in their diet. With so much choice, how do you pick the right supplement for your child? Multivitamins provide an all-in-one step to ensure your child is receiving the correct vitamins without messing around with multiple products. Look for multivitamins that contain vitamins A, C and D3, as these are the nutrients that are commonly missed in the diets of young children. It can also be beneficial to choose a multivitamin that has a pleasant taste and have a pleasant texture, such as a jelly, as this will encourage your child to take them regularly.

cosmetic_authorized_claim.data: This product is a medicine; make sure to speak to your doctor before taking this product if you have an underlying medical problem or are taking any other medicine or complementary therapy. If your symptoms get worse or continue after taking this product, contact us or your doctor.

usage_indicaion.data: This product is suitable for children aged 3 - 7. Chew 1 - 2 jellies per day. Do NOT exceed the recommended intake and do not administer to children

cosmetics_text_formula.data: A mix ofB Vitamins, Vitamin A, Vitamin B12, Vitamin B6, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E.

description.data: These Chewable Vitamin C tablets are a daily vitamin supplement that are easy to take without a glass of water. These orange flavoured tablets help to support your body from the inside out, providing more than the recommended amount of vitamin C you need every day.

usage_indicaion.data: Take 1 Numark Chewable Vitamin C tablet once a day. For best results take with food. Do not take more than the recommended dose.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Vitamin C is an important vitamin which helps to protect your cells and keep them healthy. It helps your body to maintain healthy skin, bones, blood vessels, and cartilage and helps wounds to heal. The NHS recommends that adults need around 40mg of Vitamin C every day.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Numark Chewable Vitamin C tablets contain 500mg of Vitamin C in each tablet. This not only meets, but exceeds the recommended amount of vitamin C that adults need every day.

description.data: Floradix Liquid Iron is a daily supplement that contains a range of vitamins and iron which may help to reduce tiredness and fatigue. It’s dairy free, lactose free, vegetarian friendly, and suitable for the whole family. Floradix Liquid is available in 250ml and 500ml bottles.

usage_indicaion.data:
For best results take on an empty stomach, either 30 minutes before a meal or 2 hours after.

Adults and children over the age of 12: take 10ml (two 5ml teaspoons) twice a day
Children aged 6 – 12: take 10ml (two 5ml teaspoons) once a day
Children aged of 3 – 5: take 5ml once a day

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Floradix Liquid Iron contains B vitamins, Vitamin C and iron, which all contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue and promote normal energy-yielding metabolism. Iron also helps to encourage normal red blood cell growth and haemoglobin formation. Vitamin C helps iron to be absorbed, helping it to become more effective.

description.data: Active Iron capsules are a daily food supplement that are perfect for all the family. Just one capsule a day is enough to give you all the iron you need to be tough on tiredness. They’re free from wheat and gluten and contain no sugar or preservatives. Active Iron capsules are available from Chemist 4 U in packs of 10 and 30 capsules.

usage_indicaion.data: For adults and children over the age of 12, take 1 Active Iron capsule every day. Do not take more than the recommended daily amount.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Research has shown that getting enough iron every day can help to ease tiredness and fatigue. Active Iron capsules contain 14mg of iron in every capsule, this is enough to fulfil 100% of your daily NRV (Nutritional Reference Value) of iron. They’re easy on your stomach and don’t cause inflammation, which helps to prevent unwanted side effects such as stomach pain, cramps, nausea, and constipation.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: There are lots of different people who could benefit from daily iron supplements. For example, women who are pregnant or have heavier periods may find that they benefit from iron supplements as they can struggle to get enough iron from their body alone. If you exercise regularly, then you may also benefit from Active Iron, as iron helps to transport oxygen around your body and helps to ease tiredness and fatigue.

description.data: Vitabiotics Feroglobin Liquid Gentle Iron – 500ml

usage_indicaion.data: During a heavy period, some women can lose over 80ml of blood, potentially depleting their body’s iron stores in the process. Supplementing this iron with Feroglobin can reduce their chances of developing iron deficiency, which is the most common nutrient deficiency in women.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Feroglobin is a liquid iron supplement by Vitabiotics that can help to reduce tiredness and fatigue by contributing to the normal formation of haemoglobin, a protein in red blood cells that allows them to carry oxygen around the body. The formula contains 14 essential minerals and nutrients including vitamin C, vitamin B12, zinc and folic acid to contribute to normal oxygen transport and energy release. Feroglobin is generally suitable for the whole family and can be particularly beneficial for pregnant or menstruating women, vegetarians, growing children and athletes.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: One teaspoon of Feroglobin is approximately 5ml. Adults should take one teaspoon twice a day, children aged 7-12 years should take one teaspoon once or twice a day, and children aged 3-6 years should take half a teaspoon twice a day. During pregnancy or menstruation, adult women should take one teaspoon three times a day.

description.data: Sudocrem skin recovery cream is designed for teenagers, young adults and anyone who are prone to spots and break outs. The cream soothes red, irritated and sensitive skin whilst locking moisture into the skin. Sudocrem is also suitable for soothing small rashes and dry patches of skin.

usage_indicaion.data:
Wash and dry the skin of the affected area and the hands.
Gently apply a small amount of Sudocrem directly onto the affected areas.
Massage into the skin using small circular motions, this will create a thin, translucent protective layer on the skin.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Skin recovery cream from Sudocrem works by enriching the skin with moisture and forming a barrier which protects the skin from irritants. As the cream is ultra-gentle it can be used as often as needed and leaves the skin with a healthy glow. The small size makes it suitable to take travelling or using when you're on-the-go.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Aqua, Parrafin Liquidium, Zinc Oxide, Paraffin, Lanolin, Qzqkerite, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Benzyl Benzonate, Synthetic Beeswax, Benzyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Parfum, Linayl Acetate, BHA, Citric Acid, BHT.

description.data: Numark Vitamin D Tablets are a daily vitamin which helps to support healthy teeth and bones. They contain more than your recommended dietary allowance for the day, so you can be sure that you’re getting enough Vitamin D, no matter what. These tablets are vegetarian friendly.

usage_indicaion.data: Take one Numark Vitamin D Tablet every day. For best results, take with food. Do not take more than the recommended daily dose, as taking more than 100mcg of Vitamin D a day can be harmfu

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Vitamin D is an essential nutrient which helps your body to regulate the amounts of calcium and phosphate that it stores. It helps to keep your teeth, bones, and muscles healthy, and your body can create it from the sunlight that hits your skin. In the winter months, some people can benefit from a Vitamin D supplement as they don’t see as much sunlight as they would during Summer, making it more difficult for them to get enough Vitamin D every day.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Numark Vitamin D Tablets contain 25mcg of Vitamin D in each tablet. The NHS recommends that adults need 10mcg of Vitamin D a day, meaning that this daily tablet will give you all of the Vitamin D you need.

cosmetic_clinical_evaluation.data: This product is a medicine; make sure to speak to your doctor or Chemist-4-U pharmacist before taking this product if you have an underlying medical problem or are taking any other medicine or complementary therapy.

description.data: Elizabeth Arden optimizing skin serum creates a revitalizing serum containing retinyl linoleate, a molecule derived from vitamin A that retexturizes skin soft but effectively unifying tone, preventing the appearance of fine lines, minimizing the appearance of pores and giving skin a radiant overall look. It reveals healthy and glowing skin tone.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: The serum uses retinyl complex to gently retexturize the skin, it reveals healthy and glowing skin tone.

description.data: Generosity™ Water differentiates from other alkaline brands because of our natural and active ionic calcium ingredients. Our water is first purified through reverse osmosis, then infused with natural minerals (calcium, magnesium, sodium and potassium). This is done through a natural process where the water flows over ceramic marbles made of pulverized pearl, coral, and seashells.

Generosity™ Water differentiates from other alkaline brands because of our natural and active ionic calcium ingredients. Our water is first purified through reverse osmosis, then infused with natural minerals (calcium, magnesium, sodium and potassium). This is done through a natural process where the water flows over ceramic marbles made of pulverized pearl, coral, and seashells.

The exotically sourced minerals create an “active” alkalinity state that allows the body’s receptors to receive the minerals directly into the bloodstream transporting vital hydrating minerals to the appropriate organs. Allowing one’s body to retain Generosity’s™ alkalized H20.

Generosity’s™ proprietary sourcing and bio-ceramic process allows our pH 10 Water to be engineered from any Water Source, removing the need for expensive and antiquated filtration systems, reducing the over commercialized need of the strong demand of tapping an already scarce resource of Natural Spring Water infrastructures around the world. Eliminating one of the most expensive costs in the Water Industry. The maintenance, sanitation, and logistics of transporting Natural Spring Water.

Generosity™ Water se diferencia de otras marcas alcalinas debido a nuestros ingredientes de calcio iónico activo y natural. Nuestra agua se purifica primero mediante ósmosis inversa, luego se infunde con minerales naturales (calcio, magnesio, sodio y potasio).

description.data: Japanese rice is a short grain white rice that is fluffy and slightly sticky. Unlike long grain rice, including Basmati rice and jasmine rice, Japanese rice grains stick to each other when cooked. This is quite important because you can easily pick up a mouthful of rice with chopsticks.

El arroz japonés es un arroz blanco de grano corto que es esponjoso y ligeramente pegajoso. A diferencia del arroz de grano largo, incluido el arroz basmati y el arroz jazmín, los granos de arroz japonés se adhieren entre sí cuando se cocinan. Esto es muy importante porque puede recoger fácilmente un bocado de arroz con palillos.
日本大米是一种短粒白米，蓬松略粘。 与印度香米和茉莉香米等长粒米不同，日本米粒在煮熟时会相互粘连。 这很重要，因为你可以用筷子轻松夹起一口米饭。

food_ingredients.data: 100% Japanese rice

Apply Nuxuriance Ultra® Global Anti-Aging Eye and Lip Cream in the morning and/or evening to the skin around your eyes and lips.

Take one pump from the bottle and distribute between your two middle fingers.
Use your middle finger to smooth your lower and upper eyelids, working towards the outside and maintaining an upward pressure for 3 seconds on the temples. Repeat 3 times.
Pinch both eyebrows simultaneously. Repeat the process, working towards the outer side of the eye. Repeat 3 times.
Use your middle finger to smooth your top and bottom lips, first in one direction and then the other. Then pull the corners of your lips upwards and maintain the pressure for 3 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

cosmetics_text_bapplication.data:
Apply Nuxuriance Ultra® Global Anti-Aging Eye and Lip Cream in the morning and/or evening to the skin around your eyes and lips.

Take one pump from the bottle and distribute between your two middle fingers.
Use your middle finger to smooth your lower and upper eyelids, working towards the outside and maintaining an upward pressure for 3 seconds on the temples. Repeat 3 times.
Pinch both eyebrows simultaneously. Repeat the process, working towards the outer side of the eye. Repeat 3 times.
Use your middle finger to smooth your top and bottom lips, first in one direction and then the other. Then pull the corners of your lips upwards and maintain the pressure for 3 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

description.data: Kalms One-A-Night tablets are a herbal remedy for sleepless nights or temporary insomnia. If you’re struggling to drop off to sleep at night or find yourself waking up in the night so you can’t get some quality sleep, this product may help you to fall asleep and stay asleep. Kalms One-A-Night uses valerian root, a herbal remedy traditionally used to relieve insomnia and help you get your 8 hours of sleep. If you prefer natural remedies to sleeping pills, this could be the ideal choice for you.

usage_indicaion.data: Take one Kalms One-A-Night tablet 30 - 60 minutes before you’re planning to go to bed. The effects of these tablets may not happen immediately, take them continuously for 2 - 4 weeks for best results. Do not take more tablets than you’re told to take by your doctor or pharmacist, or specified in the patient information leaflet included with this product.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Each Kalms One-A-Night tablet contains 385mg of an active ingredient called valerian root extract. Valerian root is a natural ingredient which is traditionally used to help you fall asleep, and it’s a popular ingredient in herbal sleep remedies. It’s thought to ease your short-term insomnia by making you feel drowsy, helping you to drop off for a good night’s sleep.

name.data: Nytol Herbal One a Night Tablets - Pack of 21

description.data: Nytol Herbal One a Night Tablets are a natural sleeping aid that can help you to get a better night sleep. This product offers a traditional herbal alternative to traditional sleeping tablets and only contains natural active ingredients. It contains valerian root, which can improve sleep quality and help you to fall asleep faster. If you’re looking for a natural sleep remedy to help provide temporary relief from sleep disturbances, try Nytol Herbal One a Night, for a better night’s sleep.

usage_indicaion.data:
It is recommended to take 1 tablet 30-60 minutes before you go to bed. You can also take one additional tablet earlier in the evening if it is required. This product is NOT recommended for anyone under the age of 18. The effects of this product may not occur immediately, so you should take the tablets continuously for 2-4 weeks.

Alcohol may increase the sedative effect of Nytol Herbal One a Night Tablets, so it is important to avoid excessive alcohol consumption.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: The active ingredient in Nytol Herbal is valerian root which has traditionally been used to promote calm and restful sleep. It’s perfect for those who prefer a natural sleep remedy rather than a sleeping pill with an active ingredient that is a medicine or drug. It contains a higher dose of valerian (385mg)  compared with other Nytol herbal products, so you only need to take one tablet to aid better quality sleep. Try Nytol One a Night for a simple solution for temporary sleeplessness and wake up refreshed and ready to take on the day.

description.data:

Plus, because the clever Moist Balance drawer keeps the level of humidity inside steady, it creates the ideal environment for all your fruits and vegetables. This keeps them fresher and tastier for longer. And, as the efficient Compressor uses brushless magnets to reduce friction, it’s quiet to run and much more durable than other models.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data:
Formulated with 97% of ingredients of natural origin, Pure Water H2O Biolane allows to clean perfectly and gently the skin of the baby.

This lotion is used without rinsing and thus avoids the drying action of cleaning with water. Its very gentle washing base preserves the skin's natural balance and can be used on all sensitive areas of the baby's face, body and seat.

Result: clean and delicately scented, the baby's skin remains supple and comfortable.

description.data:
Easy to swallow caramel flavoured liquid sleep aid.

Sleep is a very important part of our daily lives and getting a good night's sleep keeps our body and mind healthy. Sleeping also helps to boost our immune system, drive our metabolism, rejuvenate our skin and gives our brain time to decompress the day's events. That's why Nytol have formulated a liquid sleep aid to combat temporary sleeplessness and help you get the good night's sleep that you deserve.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Nytol caramel 300ml is a clinically proven sleep aid that contains the active ingredient diphenhydramine hydrochloride, which is an antihistamine that works by blocking the body's response to histamine - an agent that is responsible for causing an allergic response such as hay fever, stings and rashes. Histamine also looks after the brain-s waking system so diphenhydramine hydrochloride can help alleviate temporary sleeplessness.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Nytol liquid contains the active ingredient Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride which is an antihistamine. It works to treat insomnia by blocking the body’s response to histamine which is involved in the brain’s waking system. The liquid format is easier to administer, compared with traditional tablets and has a delicious caramel flavour. Nytol is suitable for children aged over 16 and adults.

usage_indicaion.data: This product should only be used as a sleep aid for anyone aged over 16 and adults. Do NOT administer to children aged under 16. Take 10 - 25 ml at bedtime or after retiring when sleep is not easy to achieve. Do NOT take a repeat dose in the same night.

name.data: Nurofen Joint and Back Pain Relief 16 Capsules

erp_name.data: Nurofen Joint and Back Pain Relief

description.data: Nurofen Joint and Back Pain Relief 16 Capsules is for the relief of: headaches, period pain, muscular pain, cold and flu symptoms, migraine, dental pain, rheumatic pain, backache, neuralgia, feverishness.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: For the relief of pain and inflammation associated with backache, rheumatic pain, muscular aches, pains or swellings such as sprains, strains and sports injuries.

cosmetics_text_formula.data:
The tablets contain 512mg Sodium Ibuprofen. 
Features. Sodium Ibuprofen 512mg

usage_indicaion.data:
This product is for short term use only. You should take the lowest dose for the shortest time necessary to relieve your symptoms. This product is only suitable for adults, the elderly and children and adolescents between 12 and 18 years.

Take 1 tablet with water, up to 3 times a day as required. Leave at least four hours between doses. Do not take more than 3 tablets in 24 hours.

cosmetic_authorized_claim.data: Nurofen Joint & Back Max Strength Tablets offers pain relief for up to 8 hours.

name.data: Floradix Iron And Vitamin Tablets - 84 Tablets

description.data: Floradix Tablets are daily iron and vitamin supplements which help to reduce tiredness and fatigue. They can be taken by anyone from the age of 3 and over, making them the perfect iron supplement for the whole family. These tablets are free from gluten, wheat, dairy, and lactose, and are vegetarian-friendly.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Floradix Tablets contain iron which helps to encourage red blood cell and haemoglobin formation, especially when supported by vitamins B6 and B12. Meanwhile vitamins B2, B6, B12, and C work with the natural iron in these tablets to contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Floradix Tablets contain 7mg of iron in each tablet and a range of vitamins and minerals.

usage_indicaion.data:
For best results, take these tablets on an empty stomach, either 30 minutes before a meal or 2 hours after a meal. Take tablets with a glass of water or another cold drink. Use the following doses:

Adults and children over the age of 12: Take 1 tablet twice a day
Children aged between 3 – 12: take one tablet a day

name.data: Deep Heat Muscle Rescue Neck & Shoulder Cream 50g

erp_name.data: Deep Heat Muscle Rescue Neck & Shoulder Cream

description.data: Deep Heat Muscle Rescue helps to relieve muscular tension in your neck and shoulders but can be used on most areas of the body. It has a herbal rosemary and vanilla fragrance, meaning that it is discreet and pleasant to use. The sponge applicator makes Deep Heat Muscle Rescue easy to use and mess free, soothing and relieving tension in your muscles whenever you need it most.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Deep Heat Muscle Rescue helps to relieve muscular tension in your neck and shoulders by providing soothing warmth to the affected area. The targeting warming sensation helps your muscles to relax, relieving tension so you can get on with your day.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: It has a herbal rosemary and vanilla fragrance.

usage_indicaion.data: Squeeze a little Deep Heat Muscle Rescue cream onto the sponge applicator included and gently massage into the affected area. If this is your first timeusing this product, apply sparingly as some people may experience warmth from this product differently. If you find that you need a stronger effect, apply more as necessary.

description.data:
This medicine is an antihistamine used to help you relax and fall asleep, it reduces alertness and promotes that first drowsy stage of sleep, helping you to then drift off into a restful, deeper sleep.


Use it when you want to fall asleep, as this medication will make you feel drowsy and help you to drop off for a good night’s sleep.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Nytol One-A-night tablets work as an antihistamine, which means that they block the normal actions of histamine, a natural chemical in your body which stimulates areas of your brain which promote arousal. Each tablet contains 50mg of an ingredient called diphenhydramine hydrochloride, which blocks histamine, reducing alertness and helping you to fall into the first drowsy stage of sleep, leading to the good night’s rest that you deserve.

usage_indicaion.data: Swallow one Nytol One-A-Night tablet with water 20 minutes before you go to bed. If you wake up in the night, do not take any more tablets and do not take more than the recommended dose. Do not take these tablets for more than 2 weeks without speaking to a doctor.

name.data: Nurofen For Children Orange Flavour 100mg/5ml Oral Suspension - 100ml

erp_name.data: Nurofen For Children Orange Flavour 100mg/5ml Oral Suspension

description.data: Nurofen for Children Cold, Pain, and Fever is a liquid medicine to ease symptoms of cold and flu in children aged 3 months and over. This medicine helps to ease pain, reduce inflammation, and bring down a high fever, perfect for when your little one has picked up a cold in the Winter. Nurofen for Children is available in both orange and strawberry flavours, so you can choose the one your kiddos like most, encouraging them to take their medicine when they need it.

cosmetics_text_benefit.data: Nurofen can help to ease your child’s cold and flu symptoms because it contains an active ingredient called ibuprofen. Ibuprofen is a popular everyday painkiller, and it works as a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID), which means it changes how your body responds to pain. This helps to reduce pain, inflammation, and fever all at once, making it ideal for treating cold and flu symptoms like headaches, muscle aches, and high temperatures.

cosmetics_text_formula.data: Contains ibuprofen.

usage_indicaion.data: Before using this product, make sure the bottle cap is secured and then shake the bottle of medicine well. Remove the bottle cap and push the 5ml syringe included into the bottle neck. With the syringe firmly in place, turn the bottle upside down and gently pull down on the syringe’s plunger to measure out the amount of medicine you need. Once you’ve measured out a 5ml or 2.5ml dose, turn the bottle and syringe the right way up and remove the syringe from the bottle by twisting it. Place the end of the syringe into your child’s mouth, aiming between their cheek and gums, and gently push down on the plunger to give them their medicine. Pause to let them swallow a little at a time if necessary. Always wash the syringe and make sure the bottle cap is safely reapplied after each use.
